comments:

working for a long time). This appeared in the log:

Sorry it was the 12OO build:

eclipse.buildId=I200405121200
java.version=1.4.2_01
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US

I have released another attempt at fixing this.  The problem is that somehow, 
the field is becoming null because an async or timer is running.  I can't 
recreate it but it is possible that it might be happening when Eclipse appears 
hung (the menu bar goes white).  In that case, code that should only be 
executed on WinCE but should not be harmful on XP is running.  I have added an 
CE check and hope this fixes it.

Please be on the look out.  Thanks.
